section.title: Messages Configuration
section.para: There are two configuration options available to your Administrator. Use the select box to choose your option: 'YES AND NO'

This option allows you to prevent Administrators or System processes from sending you messages. If you are the only administrator or work with a small group of admins you may choose not to use this feature at all. It is a good idea to leave the box open while you are adding new components as it will help you be aware of system processes.
This option will result in an email being sent to you each time you receive a new message.
